metadata.synopsis: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith unknowingstly was knocked unconcious by Orin the Red.  He only awakes once Orin the Red has teleported away - leaving the players with the awkward circumstance of being at his smithy.  He views the players with suspicion until convinced either-wise.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Goto 12.1, -51.6, -51 or bookmark "BGO_Rivington_AngleIronSmithy".2) Encounter with Orin who's disguised as the smith.3) After the encounter, the real Smith will appear and talk to the players.

12.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
12.text: You! Try attacking me when my back isn't turned, you bloody coward!
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: The smith comes running out of the smithy, one hand to the back of his head, the other clutching an iron bar like a weapon. He spots the player - accuses them.NodeContext: Accusing

73.speaker: Player
73.text: I didn't attack you - I've been out here the whole time.
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: Physically threatening in some way (e.g. pointing a finger at the player)NodeContext: Threatening

14.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
14.text: Don't dare lie to me. I saw you with my own eyes, grinning at me like some bloody imbecile.
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Physically threatening in some way (e.g. pointing a finger at the player)NodeContext: Threatening

47.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
47.text: I'm going to knock that smirk right off your face.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Physically threatening in some way (e.g. pointing a finger at the player)NodeContext: Threatening

15.speaker: Player
15.text: I'm telling you, it was a doppelganger!

34.speaker: Player
34.text: Brave words for a man harbouring wanted terrorists in his cellar.

75.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
75.text: Terrorists? Is that why you belted me over the head?

16.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
16.text: Those gnomes are victims. They've spent years in exile, no forge to call their own, all because of some ancient bloody grudge.

3.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
3.text: The Gondians think they're the only ones fit to swing a hammer round here. They're wrong. One day they'll learn that the hard way.

41.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
41.text: Until that happens, I'll give those Ironhands a roof over their heads. Nothing wrong with it.

46.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
46.text: Go on - take your thuggery elsewhere. Bloody animal.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: I know it's hard to believe, but you really were attacked by a doppelganger.
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: Relaxes a little - he's accepted you're not the one responsible.NodeContext: Still threatening, but knows you're not responsible

21.speaker: Player
21.text: You must have been attacked by my twin. They're a real handful.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Relaxes a little - he's accepted you're not the one responsible.NodeContext: Still threatening, but knows you're not responsible

19.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
19.text: Well, you'd better knock some sense into that bloody thug, before I do.
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Relaxes a little - he's accepted you're not the one responsible.NodeContext: Still threatening, but knows you're not responsible

69.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
69.text: Well, you'd better knock some sense into that bloody thug, before I do.
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Relaxes a little - he's accepted you're not the one responsible.NodeContext: Still threatening, but knows you're not responsible

7.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
7.text: Hard enough trying to make a bloody living without some moron cracking your skull for no good reason.

2.text: A liar AND a thug. It's time someone beat some bloody respect into you.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tense, ready to fight the playerNodeContext: Threatening, leading into a fight

6.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
6.text: A liar AND a thug. It's time someone beat some bloody respect into you.
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tense, ready to fight the playerNodeContext: Threatening, leading into a fight

70.speaker: Player
70.text: Try it, and you'll be smiling without teeth for the rest of your life.
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: The blacksmith drops his guard, adopts a more peaceful stanceNodeContext: Scared, but trying to sound like he's still in control

38.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
38.text: You know what? Not worth it.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: The blacksmith drops his guard, adopts a more peaceful stanceNodeContext: Scared, but trying to sound like he's still in control

63.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
63.text: You know what? Not worth it.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: The blacksmith drops his guard, adopts a more peaceful stanceNodeContext: Scared, but trying to sound like he's still in control

65.text: Spoken like the vicious scum you are.

61.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
61.text: Spoken like the vicious scum you are.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: You had a blow to the head. Are you sure you're remembering correctly?
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Relaxes a little - he's accepted you're not the one responsible.NodeContext: Thrown - aggressive but losing confidence fast

8.text: Well - I - I'm sure it was you. Almost certain...
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Relaxes a little - he's accepted you're not the one responsible.NodeContext: Thrown - aggressive but losing confidence fast

55.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
55.text: Well - I - I'm sure it was you. Almost certain...
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Relaxes a little - he's accepted you're not the one responsible.NodeContext: Thrown - aggressive but losing confidence fast

22.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
22.text: Oh Gods be damned, I don't know. I'd have sworn but - my head's pounding, I don't remember.
22.context: NodeContext: Still annoyed, but accepting he can't prove anything.

40.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
40.text: I need a bloody drink. Go on - clear off. I've seen enough of your face today.
40.context: NodeContext: Final - I'm done with the conversation

67.speaker: Player
67.text: Hallucinations. Irrational anger. These are symptoms of a serious head injury.
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: He slumps, putting a hand to his head.NodeContext: Frustrated, remembering his pain

24.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
24.text: You're not wrong. Feels like my brain's been drawn on the anvil.
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: He slumps, putting a hand to his head.NodeContext: Frustrated, remembering his pain

36.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
36.text: You're not wrong. Feels like my brain's been drawn on the anvil.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: He slumps, putting a hand to his head.NodeContext: Frustrated, remembering his pain

37.text: And we both know who bloody gave them to me, don't we?

48.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
48.text: And we both know who bloody gave them to me, don't we?

13.speaker: Player
13.text: You were attacked by a doppelganger. She was impersonating me.
13.context: NodeContext: Furious, and NOW you're lying to him

25.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
25.text: Is that so? You've got some evil twin running round whacking people round the back of the head?
25.context: NodeContext: Furious, and NOW you're lying to him

43.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
43.text: I tell you now - you'll be seeing bloody double when I'm done with you.
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Physically threatening in some way (e.g. pointing a finger at the player)NodeContext: Threatening

56.speaker: Player
56.text: What in the nine Hells are you talking about?

49.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
49.text: Now you're acting innocent are you? After you near caved my bloody skull in?

59.speaker: Player
59.text: Go on. Say that again. Like you really, really mean it...

31.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
31.text: I- I don't need to. I know what you did, whacking me over the head. Near caved my skull in!

33.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
33.context: NodeContext: Not happy  - "why the hell are you still bothering me?"

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I want to know why you're harbouring Ironhand Gnomes in your cellar.

27.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
27.text: Now clear off. You want anything else - go to the shop. I've got work to do.

58.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
58.text: Then go down to the bloody shop. I've got work to do.

39.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
39.text: Please - keep bothering me. I've no work to get on with.
39.context: NodeContext: "Are you serious?" - Barely disguised sarcasm

51.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
51.text: If you're a customer, go down to the shop. Otherwise - clear off.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: I want to know why you're harbouring Ironhand Gnomes in your cellar.

62.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
62.text: Been poking around downstairs have you? Well I've got nothing to hide.

17.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
17.text: Well, given this is in fact a blacksmiths, we sell things that need smithing.

9.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
9.text: My shopkeeper can tell you more. Give the lazy sod something to do for once.
9.context: NodeContext: dismissing you - this is a waste of time

30.speaker: Player
30.text: Watch your tone. No one speaks to me that way.

68.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
68.text: Oh, I'm very sorry. If you're offended, feel free to make a complaint.
